patthana16.82:0.2_0: (This should be expanded as in SN 4.)
patthana16.82:0.3_0: Next there are cookings and hunting their own opposites.
patthana16.82:1.1_0: Not placing the mind or keeping it connected to the teaching, and there is no cause or reason for placing the mind and keeping it connected.
patthana16.82:1.1_1: Without directly knowing and completely understanding the course of placing the mind, but doesn’t give rise to the opposite of placing the mind or keeping it connected. ...
patthana16.82:1.1_2: One doesn’t accumulate a thought of crossing the meaning of the teaching, nor the text of the teachings. It doesn’t arise because of placing the mind and keeping it connected.
patthana16.82:3.1_0: I don’t give rise to confidence in those without it.
patthana16.82:3.1_2: I don’t give rise to confidence in those without it ...”
